item.title: Add Env Variables by Nonadmin
item.content:
use user defined variables, Only System variable require elevated previlages

for windows, use setx command.

setx <variable> <value>

setting path

setx path "%path% <newPath>

if env variables not reflected, please restart

item.title: Qkus
item.description: Getting Started with quarkus install java jdk 11 or 17, set JAVA_HOME, JDK_HOME, variable. install maven , means have add the maven bin path in the path variable. in VScode install Quarkus tools for vscode.
item.content:
Getting Started with quarkus

install java jdk 11 or 17, set JAVA_HOME, JDK_HOME, variable. install maven , means have add the maven bin path in the path variable.

in VScode install Quarkus tools for vscode.
